thread.title: New York DJ Stud1nt’s “Suture” Is Controlled Dance Chaos
thread.title_full: New York DJ Stud1nt’s “Suture” Is Controlled Dance Chaos

author: Jesse Weiss
title: New York DJ Stud1nt’s “Suture” Is Controlled Dance Chaos
text:
Bandcamp / Buy 
Queens, NY resident Izzy Barreiro DJs and produces disorienting club music as stud1nt , and is a core member of the queer artist collective KUNQ . Barreiro’s latest offering, “Suture” arrives on the impressively diverse Club Chai Vol. 1 compilation, showcasing underground artists involved with the Oakland event series of the same name. “Suture” is a dark, moody track, balanced by stud1nt’s chaotic touch. Disembodied cries echo out into the void between stuttering drums. The percussive elements and vibe borrow from the murky post-club sounds pioneered by Night Slugs and Fade to Mind . It’s a snapshot of stud1nt’s approach to DJ sets, favoring tracks brimming with raw energy and emotion, shaped by beats as disorienting as they are invigorating. With “Suture,” the young producer shows they are a master of controlling chaos.
